area_name: Breaking Point Boulder aka Single Carot

content.description:
Crimpy problem located in the central area of the rock maze.  Follow the directions that are given in the intro to the central Rock Maze area.  This problem is right near Slot Machine, Violins, and Southern Discomfort. 

  Find the triangular shaped boulder with a short steep face.  The problem climbs up crimpers that start at an obvious previously broken off hold (hence the name).

pathTokens: Breaking Point Boulder aka Single Carot

content.description: The breaking point boulder is a beautiful obvious boulder when you first enter into the "main" area. This boulder offers a few different problems. One classic V3/4 known as Single Carot.
